review: Great to watch Netflix, YouTube and other favorite videos. It is an easy way to stream media to a TV. Quality is 100 times good if the media has an app (such as netflix, hulu, youtube etc). Other media quality is o.k in my opinion. Overall this is a great device to stream media on to TV
author: NK Pati

review: could be better,would work better if when downloading it, it would  not have so many pop ups on computer.
author: brian

review: Somewhat more difficult to use than a Roku, but it works as advertised perfectly once you get used to it.
author: Capt GH "Capt GH"

review: It gave me nothing more than I already had with my ipad. We always used our ipad with a $10 USB cord to connect it to the TV. Now after purchasing a new router that will work with Chromecast and Chromecast Streaming Media Player for a total of $250 I have nothing different. We still need to use our ipad to operate the worthless Chromecast that won't even play Amazon Prime Videos. Don't buy it, use the $10 cord instead. Very disappointed, make sure to read the fine print before you purchase!
author: Jeana Lam-Pickett
